title: BMAT02
alarm_message: Base Foil Pin Hole not Ready
reasons_remedies: Pin Hole is not Ready/powered on. a. Check if the Pin Hole system is ready and powered on.
The ready signal is not coming from the pin hole system. a. Check the signal coming from the pin hole system and take corrective action.
text_for_embedding:
Error Code BMAT02
Error Code 02
Category: BMAT
Title: BMAT02
Alarm Message: Base Foil Pin Hole not Ready
Reason & Remedy:
1. Pin Hole is not Ready/powered on. a. Check if the Pin Hole system is ready and powered on.
2. The ready signal is not coming from the pin hole system. a. Check the signal coming from the pin hole system and take corrective action.
Visual References:
- Camera System Location
